title: ANOTHER Group of Graded T205s for Your Consideration
author: Eggoman

posts.post_title: ANOTHER Group of Graded T205s for Your Consideration
posts.post_content:
Hello All!

Here are some more T205s from a recent purchase! ALL are graded by PSA.  Any that do not sell will be listed on eBay in a week or two…

ALL cards are Blue Piedmont Factory 25 backs, unless noted. 

BATES – Red Sweet Cap Reverse - PSA 3.5 - [STRIKE]$45[/STRIKE] - $32


BECKER – Sovereign Reverse – PSA 4 - [STRIKE]$60[/STRIKE] - $45 - SOLD
JONES - PSA 4 – [STRIKE]$52[/STRIKE] - $40 - SOLD
OAKES - Polar Bear Reverse - PSA 4 – [STRIKE]$55[/STRIKE] - $42 - SOLD
CAMNITZ - PSA 4 – [STRIKE]$52 [/STRIKE] SOLD
DELAHANTY - Sovereign Reverse – PSA 4 - [STRIKE]$60[/STRIKE] SOLD
DOWNEY  - Red Sweet Cap reverse – PSA 4 – [STRIKE]$52 [/STRIKE] SOLD


Please message me if you are interested. I will sell these cards in the order that I receive your requests. "A commitment to buy takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.” (I stole that phraseology from someone, but I DO like it!)

(All prices are “Net to Me” and include shipping.)

PayPal – Friends or Family is preferred OR “Regular” PayPal + 3%!

Thank you in advance!
Thanks for another solid card, Greg!
Final Discount before they head off to eBay - ANY INTEREST?
